mapper.sql: id, user_name, password, real_name, tel_no, email, status, theme, create_operator, create_time, update_pwd_time, dept_id
mapper.update: update boss_shiro_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel_no = #{telNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, theme = #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_operator = #{createOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_pwd_time = #{updatePwdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, password, real_name, tel_no, email, status, theme, create_operator, create_time, update_pwd_time, dept_id from boss_shiro_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
